protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Functions as a negative regulator of AP-1 mediated transcription by binding to Jun proteins. Jun/B-ATF heterodimers bind DNA preferentially at the 12-O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13- acetate response element (TRE) (consensus:5'-TGA[CG]TCA-3') and weaker at the cAMP-responsive region (CRE) (consensus:5'- GTGACGT[AC][AG]-3'), but are transcriptionally inert

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity

protein_properties.protein_sequence: >Basic leucine zipper transcriptional factor ATF-like MPHSSDSSDSSFSRSPPPGKQDSSDDVRRVQRREKNRIAAQKSRQRQTQKADTLHLESED LEKQNAALRKEIKQLTEELKYFTSVLNSHEPLCSVLAASTPSPPEVVYSAHAFHQPHVSS PRFQP
